desc: This is the first public GitHub release!
notes: - Added a tutorial that plays the first time you run the shortcut./n- Added update checker./n- Organized configuration files into a folder stored at “On My iPhone/Bing Wallpaper”./n- Added dictionary to replace most text blocks./n- Linked all folders to the create folder block to reduce error./n- Changed wording of some import questions./n- First public release on GitHub! Development versions have been archived and will be made available below.
